## Description {#details}

Subclass of <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ddgnode">DDGNode</a> representing the root node of the graph.

There should only be one such node in a given graph.

Definition at line 93 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/ddg-h">DDG.h</a>.
